title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1201.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1201.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

In general, section
381
of the

Executive Law directs that the State's cities, towns and villages administer
and enforce the New York State Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code
(Uniform Code). However, the statute contemplates the need for alternative
procedures for certain classes of buildings based upon their design, construction, ownership, occupancy or use, and authorizes the Secretary of

State to establish those procedures. Those exceptions are the subject of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1201.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
